00056 int main( int argc, char *argv[] )
00057 {
00058 
00059   try {
00060 
00061   const char *refFile = NULL;
00062   const char *maskFile = NULL, *trefFile = NULL;
00063   const char *rbf = NULL;
00064   const char *tpath = NULL;
00065 
00066   double rspa, rgra, factor;
00067 
00068   TCLAP::CmdLine cmd("Resampling of dwi sequences using Radial Basis Functions", ' ', "Unversioned");
00069 
00070   TCLAP::ValueArg<std::string> inputArg("i","input","Original sequence",true,"","string",cmd);
00071   TCLAP::ValueArg<std::string> outputArg("o","output","Corrected sequence",true,"","string",cmd);
00072   TCLAP::ValueArg<std::string> tpathArg("t","transformation-folder","Path to transforms",true,"","string",cmd);
00073   TCLAP::ValueArg<std::string> maskArg("m","mask","Image mask for the input sequence",true,"","string",cmd);
00074 
00075   TCLAP::ValueArg<std::string> refArg("r","reference","Reference image to specify the resampling grid"
00076       ,false,"","string",cmd);
00077   TCLAP::ValueArg<std::string> trefArg("","tref","Transform from reference to sequence"
00078       ,false,"","string",cmd);
00079 
00080   TCLAP::ValueArg<std::string> rbfArg("","rbf","Radial basis function (default gauss)",false,"gauss","string",cmd);
00081   TCLAP::ValueArg<float> rspaArg("","rspa","Spatial kernel width (default 1)",false,1,"float",cmd);
00082   TCLAP::ValueArg<float> rgraArg("","rgra","Angular kernel width (default 0.5)",false,0.2,"float",cmd);
00083   TCLAP::ValueArg<float> factorArg("","resampling-factor","The voxel size of the reconstructed image is the original "
00084       "in-plane spacing divided by this value. (default 1)",false, 1.0,"float",cmd);
00085 
00086   TCLAP::SwitchArg oriSwitch("","original-space","Original resampling space. "
00087       "By default, an isovoxel reconstruction is performed.", cmd, false);
00088   TCLAP::SwitchArg refSwitch("","reference-space","Resampling space provided by image reference. "
00089       "By default, an isovoxel reconstruction is performed.", cmd, false);
00090 
00091   // Parse the argv array.
00092   cmd.parse( argc, argv );
00093 
00094   tpath    = tpathArg.getValue().c_str();
00095   refFile  = refArg.getValue().c_str();
00096   maskFile = maskArg.getValue().c_str();
00097   trefFile = trefArg.getValue().c_str();
00098 
00099   // Interpolation parameters
00100   rbf = rbfArg.getValue().c_str();
00101   rspa = rspaArg.getValue();
00102   rgra = rgraArg.getValue();
00103   factor = factorArg.getValue();
00104 
00105   char input[255];
00106   strcpy( input, (char*)inputArg.getValue().c_str() );
00107   strcat ( input,".nii" );
00108 
00109   char bvec[255];
00110   strcpy( bvec, (char*)inputArg.getValue().c_str() );
00111   strcat ( bvec,".bvec" );
00112 
00113   char bval[255];
00114   strcpy( bval, (char*)inputArg.getValue().c_str() );
00115   strcat ( bval,".bval" );
00116 
00117   char output[255];
00118   strcpy( output, (char*)outputArg.getValue().c_str() );
00119   strcat ( output,".nii.gz" );
00120 
00121   char bvec_out[255];
00122   strcpy( bvec_out, (char*)outputArg.getValue().c_str() );
00123   strcat ( bvec_out,".bvec" );
00124 
00125   char bval_out[255];
00126   strcpy( bval_out, (char*)outputArg.getValue().c_str() );
00127   strcat ( bval_out,".bval" );
00128 
00129 
00130   // Read sequence
00131 
00132   typedef short         PixelType;
00133 
00134   const   unsigned int  Dimension = 4;
00135   typedef itk::Image< PixelType, Dimension >   SequenceType;
00136   typedef itk::ImageFileReader< SequenceType >  SequenceReaderType;
00137 
00138   SequenceReaderType::Pointer sequenceReader = SequenceReaderType::New();
00139   sequenceReader -> SetFileName( input );
00140   sequenceReader -> Update();
00141   SequenceType::Pointer       sequence     = sequenceReader -> GetOutput();
00142 
00143   // Read mask for DW sequence
00144 
00145   typedef itk::Image< unsigned char, 3 >   ImageMaskType;
00146   typedef itk::ImageFileReader< ImageMaskType >  ImageMaskReaderType;
00147 
00148   ImageMaskReaderType::Pointer imageMaskReader = ImageMaskReaderType::New();
00149   imageMaskReader -> SetFileName( maskFile );
00150   imageMaskReader -> Update();
00151 
00152   typedef itk::ImageMaskSpatialObject< 3 >  MaskType;
00153   MaskType::Pointer mask = MaskType::New();
00154   mask -> SetImage( imageMaskReader -> GetOutput() );
00155 
00156   // Calcule 4D diffusion ROI for input sequence from mask
00157 
00158   SequenceType::RegionType seqROI = sequence -> GetLargestPossibleRegion();
00159   SequenceType::IndexType  seqROIIndex = seqROI.GetIndex();
00160   SequenceType::SizeType   seqROISize  = seqROI.GetSize();
00161 
00162   unsigned int numberOfFrames = seqROISize[3];
00163 
00164   MaskType::IndexType seqROI3DIndex = mask -> GetAxisAlignedBoundingBoxRegion().GetIndex();
00165   MaskType::SizeType  seqROI3DSize  = mask -> GetAxisAlignedBoundingBoxRegion().GetSize();
00166 
00167   seqROIIndex[0] = seqROI3DIndex[0];
00168   seqROIIndex[1] = seqROI3DIndex[1];
00169   seqROIIndex[2] = seqROI3DIndex[2];
00170   seqROIIndex[3] = 0; // The roi starts at the first diffusion image
00171 
00172   seqROISize[0] = seqROI3DSize[0];
00173   seqROISize[1] = seqROI3DSize[1];
00174   seqROISize[2] = seqROI3DSize[2];
00175   seqROISize[3] = seqROISize[3];
00176 
00177   seqROI.SetIndex(seqROIIndex);
00178   seqROI.SetSize(seqROISize);
00179 
00180   SequenceType::RegionType recROI = seqROI; // By default we reconstruct on the original grid
00181 
00182    // Create reconstructed sequence
00183 
00184   SequenceType::Pointer recSequence = SequenceType::New();
00185 
00186   SequenceType::SpacingType   recSpacing   = sequence -> GetSpacing();
00187   SequenceType::RegionType    recRegion    = sequence -> GetLargestPossibleRegion();
00188   SequenceType::SizeType      recSize      = recRegion.GetSize();
00189   SequenceType::IndexType     recIndex     = recRegion.GetIndex();
00190   SequenceType::PointType     recOrigin    = sequence -> GetOrigin();
00191   SequenceType::DirectionType recDirection = sequence -> GetDirection();
00192 
00193   typedef itk::Image< PixelType, 3 >   ImageType;
00194   typedef itk::ImageFileReader< ImageType >  ImageReaderType;
00195 
00196   if ( oriSwitch.isSet() )
00197   {
00198 
00199   } else if ( refSwitch.isSet() )
00200   {
00201     ImageReaderType::Pointer refImageReader = ImageReaderType::New();
00202     refImageReader -> SetFileName( refFile );
00203     refImageReader -> Update();
00204 
00205     ImageType::Pointer       refImage     = refImageReader -> GetOutput();
00206     ImageType::SpacingType   refSpacing   = refImage -> GetSpacing();
00207     ImageType::SizeType      refSize      = refImage -> GetLargestPossibleRegion().GetSize();
00208     ImageType::IndexType     refIndex     = refImage -> GetLargestPossibleRegion().GetIndex();
00209     ImageType::DirectionType refDirection = refImage -> GetDirection();
00210     ImageType::PointType     refOrigin    = refImage -> GetOrigin();
00211 
00212     recSpacing[0] = refSpacing[0];  recSpacing[1] = refSpacing[1]; recSpacing[2] = refSpacing[2];
00213 
00214     for(unsigned int i=0; i<3; i++)
00215       for(unsigned int j=0; j<3; j++)
00216         recDirection(i,j)= refDirection(i,j);
00217 
00218     recSize[0] = refSize[0];  recSize[1] = refSize[1]; recSize[2] = refSize[2];
00219     recIndex[0] = refIndex[0];  recIndex[1] = refIndex[1]; recIndex[2] = refIndex[2];
00220 
00221     recRegion.SetIndex( recIndex );
00222     recRegion.SetSize( recSize );
00223 
00224     recOrigin[0] = refOrigin[0];  recOrigin[1] = refOrigin[1]; recOrigin[2] = refOrigin[2];
00225 
00226   } else
00227     {
00228       double resolution;
00229       resolution = recSpacing[0] / factor;
00230 
00231       recSize[0] = floor( recSize[0]*recSpacing[0] / resolution + 0.5 );
00232       recSize[1] = floor( recSize[1]*recSpacing[1] / resolution + 0.5 );
00233       recSize[2] = floor( recSize[2]*recSpacing[2] / resolution + 0.5 );
00234 
00235       recSpacing[0] = resolution;
00236       recSpacing[1] = resolution;
00237       recSpacing[2] = resolution;
00238 
00239       recRegion.SetSize( recSize );
00240 
00241       SequenceType::IndexType recROIIndex = recROI.GetIndex();
00242       SequenceType::SizeType  recROISize  = recROI.GetSize();
00243 
00244       recROIIndex[0] = floor (recROIIndex[0] * sequence -> GetSpacing()[0] / recSpacing[0] + 0.5);
00245       recROIIndex[1] = floor (recROIIndex[1] * sequence -> GetSpacing()[1] / recSpacing[1] + 0.5);
00246       recROIIndex[2] = floor (recROIIndex[2] * sequence -> GetSpacing()[2] / recSpacing[2] + 0.5);
00247 
00248       recROISize[0]  = floor (recROISize[0] * sequence -> GetSpacing()[0] / recSpacing[0] + 0.5);
00249       recROISize[1]  = floor (recROISize[1] * sequence -> GetSpacing()[1] / recSpacing[1] + 0.5);
00250       recROISize[2]  = floor (recROISize[2] * sequence -> GetSpacing()[2] / recSpacing[2] + 0.5);
00251 
00252       recROI.SetIndex( recROIIndex );
00253       recROI.SetSize( recROISize );
00254     }
00255 
00256   recSequence -> SetRegions( recRegion );
00257   recSequence -> Allocate();
00258   recSequence -> FillBuffer(0.0);
00259 
00260   recSequence -> SetDirection( recDirection);
00261   recSequence -> SetOrigin( recOrigin );
00262   recSequence -> SetSpacing( recSpacing );
00263 
00264   // Read transform ref -> dwi
00265 
00266   typedef itk::AffineTransform< double, 3 > TransformType;
00267   TransformType::Pointer tref = TransformType::New();
00268   tref -> SetIdentity();
00269 
00270   // Read transformation file
00271   if ( refSwitch.isSet() && strcmp(trefFile,""))
00272   {
00273     typedef itk::TransformFileReader     TransformReaderType;
00274     typedef TransformReaderType::TransformListType * TransformListType;
00275 
00276     TransformReaderType::Pointer transformReader = TransformReaderType::New();
00277     transformReader->SetFileName( trefFile );
00278     transformReader->Update();
00279 
00280     TransformListType transforms = transformReader->GetTransformList();
00281     TransformReaderType::TransformListType::const_iterator titr = transforms->begin();
00282     tref = dynamic_cast< TransformType * >( titr->GetPointer() ) ;
00283   }
00284 
00285   // Create interpolator
00286   // WARNING : THE ORDER OF PARAMETER SETTING IS IMPORTANT !!!!
00287 
00288   typedef btk::RBFInterpolateImageFunctionS2S< SequenceType, double> InterpolatorType;
00289   InterpolatorType::Pointer interpolator = InterpolatorType::New();
00290   interpolator -> SetInputImage( sequence );
00291   interpolator -> SetTransforms(tpath);
00292   interpolator -> SetGradientTable( bvec );
00293   interpolator -> Initialize( seqROI );
00294 
00295   typedef itk::ImageRegionIteratorWithIndex<SequenceType> IteratorType;
00296 
00297   IteratorType recIt( recSequence, recROI);
00298 
00299   SequenceType::IndexType index;
00300   SequenceType::PointType pointSeq;
00301   SequenceType::PointType pointRef;
00302   ImageType::PointType pointRef3D;
00303   ImageType::PointType pointSeq3D;
00304 
00305   double theta;
00306   double phi;
00307   double value;
00308 
00309   clock_t start, finish;
00310 
00311   start = clock();
00312 
00313   // First resample the T2 image
00314   typedef itk::LinearInterpolateImageFunction< SequenceType,
00315                                                double >      LinearInterpolatorType;
00316   LinearInterpolatorType::Pointer linearInterpolator = LinearInterpolatorType::New();
00317   linearInterpolator -> SetInputImage( sequence );
00318 
00319   for (recIt.GoToBegin(); !recIt.IsAtEnd(); ++recIt)
00320   {
00321     index = recIt.GetIndex();
00322     if (index[3] ==1) break;
00323     recSequence -> TransformIndexToPhysicalPoint(index,pointRef);
00324     recIt.Set( linearInterpolator -> Evaluate(pointRef) );
00325   }
00326 
00327   unsigned int image = 0;
00328 
00329   for (; !recIt.IsAtEnd(); ++recIt)
00330   {
00331     index = recIt.GetIndex();
00332 
00333     if (index[3]!=image)
00334     {
00335       image = index[3];
00336       std::cout << "Resampling image " << image << " ... " << std::endl; std::cout.flush();
00337     }
00338 
00339     value = 0;
00340 
00341     recSequence -> TransformIndexToPhysicalPoint(index,pointRef);
00342     pointRef3D[0] = pointRef[0];  pointRef3D[1] = pointRef[1]; pointRef3D[2] = pointRef[2];
00343 
00344     if (refSwitch.isSet())
00345       pointRef3D = tref -> TransformPoint(pointRef3D);
00346 
00347     if ( mask -> IsInside(pointRef3D) )
00348     {
00349       pointSeq3D = pointRef3D;
00350 
00351       pointSeq[0] = pointSeq3D[0];
00352       pointSeq[1] = pointSeq3D[1];
00353       pointSeq[2] = pointSeq3D[2];
00354       pointSeq[3] = pointRef[3];
00355 
00356       interpolator -> GetGradientDirection(index[3],theta,phi);
00357 
00358       value =  interpolator -> Evaluate(pointSeq, theta, phi, rspa, rgra, 0);
00359     }
00360 
00361     recIt.Set( (short)value );
00362 
00363   }
00364   finish = clock();
00365 
00366   std::cout << "duracion (seg) = " << (finish - start) / CLOCKS_PER_SEC << std::endl;
00367 
00368   // Write interpolated sequence
00369 
00370   typedef itk::ImageFileWriter< SequenceType >  SequenceWriterType;
00371   SequenceWriterType::Pointer sequenceWriter = SequenceWriterType::New();
00372   sequenceWriter -> SetFileName( output );
00373   sequenceWriter -> SetInput( recSequence );
00374   sequenceWriter -> Update();
00375 
00376   // Correct gradient table
00377 
00378   vnl_matrix<double> R(3,3);
00379   R = tref -> GetMatrix().GetVnlMatrix();
00380 
00381   vnl_matrix<double> PQ = R;
00382   vnl_matrix<double> NQ = R;
00383   vnl_matrix<double> PQNQDiff;
00384 
00385   for(unsigned int ni = 0; ni < 100; ni++ )
00386   {
00387     // Average current Qi with its inverse transpose
00388     NQ = ( PQ + vnl_inverse_transpose( PQ ) ) / 2.0;
00389     PQNQDiff = NQ - PQ;
00390     if( PQNQDiff.frobenius_norm() < 1e-7 )
00391     {
00392 //      std::cout << "Polar decomposition used " << ni << " iterations " << std::endl;
00393       break;
00394     }
00395     else
00396     {
00397       PQ = NQ;
00398     }
00399   }
00400 
00401   typedef itk::Euler3DTransform<double> EulerTransformType;
00402   EulerTransformType::Pointer transform = EulerTransformType::New();
00403   transform -> SetRotationMatrix( NQ );
00404 
00405   typedef btk::DiffusionGradientTable< SequenceType > GradientTableType;
00406   GradientTableType::Pointer gradientTable = GradientTableType::New();
00407 
00408   gradientTable -> SetNumberOfGradients(numberOfFrames);
00409   gradientTable -> SetImage( sequence );
00410   gradientTable -> SetTransform( transform );
00411   gradientTable -> LoadFromFile( bvec);
00412   gradientTable -> RotateGradientsInWorldCoordinates();
00413   gradientTable -> SaveToFile( bvec_out);
00414 
00415   // Write b-values
00416   char clcopybval[255];
00417   sprintf(clcopybval,"cp %s %s",bval,bval_out);
00418   system(clcopybval);
00419 
00420   return EXIT_SUCCESS;
00421 
00422   } catch (TCLAP::ArgException &e)  // catch any exceptions
00423   { std::cerr << "error: " << e.error() << " for arg " << e.argId() << std::endl; }
00424 }
